dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 3837 IH: EO 14218 Act of 2025
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Burchett introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

form.official-title: To codify Executive Order 14218 (relating to ending taxpayer subsidization of open borders).

section.text: This Act may be cited as the EO 14218 Act of 2025.

section.header: Codification of Executive Order EO 14218, ending taxpayer subsidization of open borders
section.text: Executive Order 14218 (90 Fed. Reg. 10581; relating to ending taxpayer subsidization of open borders) shall have the force and effect of law.
